result.reason: Users lose visibility of disconnected sessions when tabs close immediately; adding an option to keep tabs open with a status overlay allows users to identify and manage disconnected sessions.
result.approach: Add 'KeepTabOpenOnDisconnect' setting and UI checkbox. Update RdpProtocol to show a 'Disconnected' overlay (using ReconnectGroup without auto-reconnect) instead of closing the tab when this option is enabled.
